display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | Activate header on PDF

AJi.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AJi.name: config_info

AJk.caption: You can put elements in the header by checking the box at the element itself that says "insert this element into header?".
AJk.name: header_info

AJl.caption: Show page number? (counter)
AJl.doc: Check this box to have you pages numerated in the header. Below you can tell what pages you want the number to not show, for example you want the first page (possibly a cover) to not show the number one.
AJl.name: show_page_number

AJm.caption: Start count on second page
AJm.doc: Check this box if you want the second page to be numerated with 1 and the remaining pages follow this order.
AJm.name: start_count_on_second_page

AJp.caption: Hide page number (counter) on specific pages?
AJp.doc: Check this box if you want to specify below the pages you want the page number to not appear.
AJp.name: use_exclude_pages

AJq.caption: Hide counter on
AJq.doc: Write here the page numbers you want the page count number not to show, like if you have a cover in the first page and want the number not to show, type 1. If you have several chapter covers (just an example) along your document and want them to not show the page count number, you may write the page numbers separated by comma, like this 1,3,5,10.
AJq.name: exclude_pages_counter

AJr.caption: Hide header elements on specific pages?
AJr.doc: Check this box if you want to specify below the pages you want the elements (text, images and tables) you inserted into the header to not appear.
AJr.name: use_exclude_elements_pages

AJs.caption: Hide elements on
AJs.doc: Write here the page numbers you want the header elements (texts, images and tables) not to show, like if you have a cover in the first page and want the elements not to show there, type 1. If you have several chapter covers (just an example) along your document and want them to not show the header elements, you may write the page numbers separated by comma, like this 1,3,5,10.
AJs.name: exclude_elements_pages

AJt.caption: * Please note that page numbers starts in number 1, if you chose to start counting on the second page the first page will turn into number 0.
AJt.name: page_numbers_info
